page.title: 14HEALTH
page.content: STRATHMARTINE HOSPITAL THIS HOSPITAL WAS FOUNDED IN 1852 FOR ORPHANS AND HANDICAPPED CHILDREN BY SIR JOHN AND LADY JANE OGILVIE. NOW IT IS STILL THE ONLY HOSPITAL IN TAYSIDE WHICH SPECIALISES IN THE CASE OF THE MENTALLY HANDICAPPED. AT PRESENT THERE ARE 615 BEDS IN 22 WARDS RANGING FROM 11 BEDS TO 50 BEDS IN ONE WARD. SOME OF THE WARDS HAVE BEEN UPDATED AND AT PRESENT ONE BIG WARD IS BEING DIVIDED INTO TWO SMALLER WARDS . THE PATIENTS' AGES RANGE FROM 3 MONTHS TO OLDER PATIENTS IN THEIR 80s .THEY ARE ALL INVOLVED IN TRAINING PROGRAMMES ACCORDING TO THEIR ABILITIES.THE PATIENTS HAVE THEIR OWN PERSONAL CLOTHING AND THOSE WHO ARE ABLE TO,CAN SHOP IN DUNDEE FOR THEIR OWN CLOTHES .REHABILITATION PROGRAMMES ARE USED THROUGHOUT THE HOSPITAL.
